entities.name: peeves
entities.description: Peeves is a poltergeist who floats over the students on his stomach with a peashooter at the ready.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is one of the main characters who is discussing whether to do something with Sirius's agreement.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a tense and miserable character who questions Harry about trusting Sirius's judgment.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is a character whose agreement with the group makes them reconsider their decision.

entities.name: katie bell
entities.description: Katie Bell is a student who gets hit by an ink pellet and starts throwing things at Peeves.

relationships.description: Harry trusts Sirius's judgment, as he has always given them great advice.
Hermione watches Katie Bell leap to her feet and start throwing things at Peeves.
